content.raw:
Sorry for the late reply on getting to this, but can you provide a bug report (on the issue tracker) or a testcase where this reliably fails? I can't figure out how `key_scores` is not already in an int format (and instead a float as reported). We have not run into this issue before.

We'd like to reproduce and fix before adding in an explicit unsafe cast.

Thanks!
